messages.content: AroBot session initialized. I'm ready to help with your medical questions.
Hello! I'm your medical assistant. I can help with medicine information, prescription analysis, and general health questions. What can I help you with?

Hello Ridwan! It's nice to see you again. Unfortunately, this is the beginning of our conversation, and I don't have any prior information about your medical history or concerns. I'm a fresh start every time!

However, I'd be happy to help you with any questions or topics you'd like to discuss. What brings you here today? Do you have a specific health question or concern that you'd like some guidance on?
do you know what is my name?

Hello Ridwan! I'm glad to see you again too! However, I should let you know that I don't actually recall your previous name or any other personal details from our last conversation. As a conversational AI, I don't have the ability to retain information about individual users between conversations.

Each time you interact with me, it's a brand new conversation, and I start from scratch. So, while I can help answer questions and provide general guidance, I won't be able to recall any specific details about your previous interactions or concerns.

That being said, I'm here to help you now! What brings you here today? Do you have a health question or concern that you'd like some guidance on?
